text: Nza bevbevira, nza wari kurkurav, nza vhɨra Fhe Bakɨmen gumgi gu mbigi ga ndɨkndɨgɨrga. Nza wari ga ndɨkndɨgɨp, nza wari wo ndɨkndɨgi khavɨrga tuavi ndi ganɨv, nza vhɨra mbe ndɨkndɨgɨp, mben ndɨkndɨgi khavi tuavi ndi ganɨv, nza zam guigira Fhe Bakɨmen gumgi gu mbigi vuzvugɨp, tɨvir vhuuin mben muunga.
